arts.ttl: Pundit explains interesting tactical part of Liverpool v Arsenal game
arts.sum: There is plenty of anticipation surrounding Arsenal’s upcoming clash with Liverpool in the Premier League, as two of the strongest sides in the division prepare to meet. Scheduled to take place tomorrow, the encounter promises high-quality football and could be one of the defining fixtures of the early season.
